            "fixedCode": "// Ensure to separate state change from the external call to mitigate reentrancy\nif (isConfirmed(transactionId)) {\n    Transaction tx = transactions[transactionId];\n    tx.executed = true; // Set execution status first\n    // Attempt to execute the external call\n    if (tx.destination.call.value(tx.value)(tx.data)) {\n        Execution(transactionId); // Log successful execution\n    } else {\n        ExecutionFailure(transactionId);\n        tx.executed = false; // Revert execution status on failure\n    }\n}"

779:                 round_.plyr = _pID;  
780:             
781:             
782:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
783:         }
784:             
785:             
786:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
787:             {
788:             airDropTracker_++;
789:             if (airdrop() == true)
790:             {
791:                 
792:                 uint256 _prize;
793:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
794:                 {
795:                     
796:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
797:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
798:                     
799:                     
800:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
801:                     
802:                     
803:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
804:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
805:                     
806:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
807:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
808:                     
809:                     
810:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
811:                     
812:                     
813:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
814:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
815:                     
816:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
817:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
818:                     
819:                     
820:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
821:                     
822:                     
823:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 100000000000000000000000000000000;
824:                 }
825:                 
826:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
827:                 
828:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
829:                 
830:                 
831:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
832:             }
833:         }
834:     
835:             
836:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
837:             
838:             
839:             plyrRnds_[_pID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID].keys);
840:             plyrRnds_[_pID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID].eth);
841:             
842:             
843:             round_.keys = _keys.add(round_.keys);
844:             round_.eth = _eth.add(round_.eth);
845:     
846:             
847:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_pID, _eth, _affID, _eventData_);
848:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_pID, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
849:             
850:             
851: 		    endTx(_pID, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
852:         }
853:     }

1001:     function endRound(RSdatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1002:         private
1003:         returns (RSdatasets.EventReturns)
1004:     {        
1005:         
1006:         uint256 _winPID = round_.plyr;
1007:         
1008:         
1009:         
1010:         uint256 _pot = round_.pot + airDropPot_;
1011:         
1012:         
1013:         
1014:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(45)) / 100;
1015:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 10);
1016:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_)) / 100;
1017:         
1018:         
1019:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_.keys);
1020:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_.keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1021:         if (_dust > 0)
1022:         {
1023:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1024:             _com = _com.add(_dust);
1025:         }
1026:         
1027:         
1028:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1029:         
1030:         
1031:         if (!address(TeamUnicorn).call.value(_com)(bytes4(keccak256("deposit()"))))
1032:         {
1033:             _gen = _gen.add(_com);
1034:             _com = 0;
1035:         }
1036:         
1037:         
1038:         round_.mask = _ppt.add(round_.mask);
1039:             
1040:         
1041:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_.end * 1000000);
1042:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000);
1043:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1044:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1045:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1046:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1047:         _eventData_.newPot = 0;
1048:         
1049:         return(_eventData_);
1050:     }

1190:

1435:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1436:         internal
1437:         pure
1438:         returns(bytes32)
1439:     {
1440:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1441:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1442:         
1443:         
1444:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1445:         
1446:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1447:         
1448:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1449:         {
1450:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1451:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1452:         }
1453:         
1454:         
1455:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1456:         
1457:         
1458:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1459:         {
1460:             
1461:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1462:             {
1463:                 
1464:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1465:                 
1466:                 
1467:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1468:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1469:             } else {
1470:                 require
1471:                 (
1472:                     
1473:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 || 
1474:                     
1475:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1476:                     
1477:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1478:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1479:                 );
1480:                 
1481:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1482:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1483:                 
1484:                 
1485:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1486:                     _hasNonNumber = true;    
1487:             }
1488:         }
1489:         
1490:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1491:         
1492:         bytes32 _ret;
1493:         assembly {
1494:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1495:         }
1496:         return (_ret);
1497:     }
1498: }

799:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
800:         private
801:     {
802:         
803:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
804:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
805: 
806:         
807:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 5000000000000000000)
808:         {
809:             uint256 _availableLimit = (5000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
810:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
811:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
812:             _eth = _availableLimit;
813:         }
814: 
815:         
816:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
817:         {
818: 
819:             
820:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
821: 
822:             
823:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
824:             {
825:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
826: 
827:             
828:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
829:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
830:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
831:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
832: 
833:             
834:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
835:         }
836: 
837:             
838:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
839:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
840: 
841:             
842:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
843:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
844:             rndTmEth_[_rID][0] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][0]);
845: 
846:             
847:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, 0, _eventData_);
848:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, 0, _keys, _eventData_);
849: 
850:             
851: 		    endTx(_pID, 0, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
852:         }
853:     }

1015:     function endRound(POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1016:         private
1017:         returns (POOHMODatasets.EventReturns)
1018:     {
1019:         
1020:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1021: 
1022:         
1023:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1024:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1025: 
1026:         
1027:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1028: 
1029:         
1030:         
1031:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;   
1032:         uint256 _dev = (_pot / 50);            
1033:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1034:         uint256 _POOH = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].pooh)) / 100;
1035:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_dev)).sub(_gen)).sub(_POOH);
1036: 
1037:         
1038:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1039:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1040:         if (_dust > 0)
1041:         {
1042:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1043:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1044:         }
1045: 
1046:         
1047:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1048: 
1049:         
1050: 
1051:         admin.transfer(_dev);
1052: 
1053:         flushDivs.transfer((_POOH.sub(_POOH / 3)).mul(2));  
1054: 
1055:         round_[_rID].pot = _pot.add(_POOH / 3);  
1056: 
1057:         
1058:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1059: 
1060:         
1061:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1062:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1063:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1064:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1065:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1066:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1067:         _eventData_.POOHAmount = _POOH;
1068:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1069: 
1070:         
1071:         rID_++;
1072:         _rID++;
1073:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1074:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(timerLengths[determineNextRoundLength()]);
1075:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1076: 
1077:         rndMax_ = round_[_rID].end;
1078: 
1079:         return(_eventData_);
1080:     }
1081: 
1082:     function determineNextRoundLength() internal view returns(uint256 time) 
1083:     {
1084:         uint256 roundTime = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(block.number - 1)))) % 6;
1085:         return roundTime;
1086:     }

1096:         if (_earnings > 0)

1100:

1115:         uint256 _newTime;

1117:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(_now);
1118:         else
1119:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(round_[_rID].end);
1120: 
1121:         
1122:         if (_newTime < (rndMax_).add(_now))
1123:             round_[_rID].end = _newTime;

1132:     function distributeExternal(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1133:         private
1134:         returns(POOHMODatasets.EventReturns)
1135:     {
1136:         
1137:         uint256 _dev = _eth / 100;  
1138: 
1139:         uint256 _POOH;
1140:         if (!address(admin).call.value(_dev)())
1141:         {
1142:             _POOH = _dev;
1143:             _dev = 0;
1144:         }
1145: 
1146: 
1147:         
1148:         uint256 _aff = _eth / 10;
1149: 
1150:         
1151:         
1152:         if (_affID != _pID && plyr_[_affID].name != '') {
1153:             plyr_[_affID].aff = _aff.add(plyr_[_affID].aff);
1154:             emit POOHMOevents.onAffiliatePayout(_affID, plyr_[_affID].addr, plyr_[_affID].name, _rID, _pID, _aff, now);
1155:         } else {
1156:             _POOH = _aff;
1157:         }
1158: 
1159:         
1160:         _POOH = _POOH.add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].pooh)) / (100));
1161:         if (_POOH > 0)
1162:         {
1163:             
1164:             uint256 _potAmount = _POOH / 2;
1165: 
1166:             flushDivs.transfer(_POOH.sub(_potAmount));
1167: 
1168:             round_[_rID].pot = round_[_rID].pot.add(_potAmount);
1169: 
1170:             
1171:             _eventData_.POOHAmount = _POOH.add(_eventData_.POOHAmount);
1172:         }
1173: 
1174:         return(_eventData_);
1175:     }

1191:     function distributeInternal(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _team, uint256 _keys, POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1192:         private
1193:         returns(POOHMODatasets.EventReturns)
1194:     {
1195:         
1196:         uint256 _gen = (_eth.mul(fees_[_team].gen)) / 100;
1197: 
1198: 
1199:         
1200:         _eth = _eth.sub(((_eth.mul(14)) / 100).add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].pooh)) / 100));
1201: 
1202:         
1203:         uint256 _pot = _eth.sub(_gen);
1204: 
1205:         
1206:         
1207:         uint256 _dust = updateMasks(_rID, _pID, _gen, _keys);
1208:         if (_dust > 0)
1209:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1210: 
1211:         
1212:         round_[_rID].pot = _pot.add(_dust).add(round_[_rID].pot);
1213: 
1214:         
1215:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen.add(_eventData_.genAmount);
1216:         _eventData_.potAmount = _pot;
1217: 
1218:         return(_eventData_);
1219:     }

1225:     function updateMasks(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _gen, uint256 _keys)
1226:         private
1227:         returns(uint256)
1228:     {
1229:         
1230: 
1231: 
1232: 
1233: 
1234: 
1235: 
1236: 
1237: 
1238: 
1239: 
1240:         
1241:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1242:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1243: 
1244:         
1245:         
1246:         uint256 _pearn = (_ppt.mul(_keys)) / (1000000000000000000);
1247:         plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask = (((round_[_rID].mask.mul(_keys)) / (1000000000000000000)).sub(_pearn)).add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].mask);
1248: 
1249:         
1250:         return(_gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / (1000000000000000000)));
1251:     }

1258:         private

1261:         
1262:         updateGenVault(_pID, plyr_[_pID].lrnd);
1263: 
1264:         
1265:         uint256 _earnings = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(plyr_[_pID].gen).add(plyr_[_pID].aff);
1266:         if (_earnings > 0)
1267:         {
1268:             plyr_[_pID].win = 0;
1269:             plyr_[_pID].gen = 0;
1270:             plyr_[_pID].aff = 0;
1271:         }

1279:     function endTx(uint256 _pID, uint256 _team, uint256 _eth, uint256 _keys, POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1280:         private
1281:     {
1282:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (now * 1000000000000000000) + (_team * 100000000000000000000000000000);

1475:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1476:         internal
1477:         pure
1478:         returns(bytes32)
1479:     {
1480:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1481:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1482: 
1483:         
1484:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0);
1485:         
1486:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20);
1487:         
1488:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1489:         {
1490:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78);
1491:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58);
1492:         }
1493: 
1494:         
1495:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1496: 
1497:         
1498:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1499:         {
1500:             
1501:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1502:             {
1503:                 
1504:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1505: 
1506:                 
1507:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1508:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1509:             } else {
1510:                 require
1511:                 (
1512:                     
1513:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 ||
1514:                     
1515:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1516:                     
1517:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a));
1518:                 
1519:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1520:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20);
1521: 
1522:                 
1523:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1524:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1525:             }
1526:         }
1527: 
1528:         require(_hasNonNumber == true);
1529: 
1530:         bytes32 _ret;
1531:         assembly {
1532:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1533:         }
1534:         return (_ret);
1535:     }
1536: }

1600:         y = x;

832:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
833:         private
834:     {
835:         
836:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
837:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
838: 
839:         
840:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 10000000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 100000000000000000000)
841:         {
842:             uint256 _availableLimit = (100000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
843:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
844:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
845:             _eth = _availableLimit;
846:         }
847: 
848:         
849:         if (_eth > 1000000000) 
850:         {
851:             
852:             
853:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
854:             
855:             
856:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
857:             {
858:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
859: 
860:             
861:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
862:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
863:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
864:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
865: 
866:             
867:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
868:         }
869: 
870: 
871:             
872:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
873: 
874:             
875:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
876:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
877: 
878:             
879:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
880:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
881:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
882: 
883:             
884:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _eth, _team, _eventData_);
885:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
886: 
887:             
888:             endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
889:         }
890:     }

1065:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1066:         private
1067:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1068:     {
1069:         
1070:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1071:         
1072:         
1073:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1074:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1075:         
1076:         
1077:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1078:         
1079:         
1080:         
1081:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(25)) / 100;
1082:         uint256 _com = (_pot.mul(3)) / 100;
1083:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1084:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1085:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1086: 
1087:         
1088:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1089:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1090:         if (_dust > 0)
1091:         {
1092:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1093:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1094:         }
1095: 
1096:         
1097:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1098: 
1099:         
1100: 
1101:         admin.transfer(_com);
1102: 
1103:         
1104:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1105: 
1106:         
1107:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1108:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1109:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1110:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1111:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1112:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1113:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1114:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1115: 
1116:         
1117:         rID_++;
1118:         _rID++;
1119:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1120:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1121:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1122: 
1123:         return(_eventData_);
1124:     }

1130:         private

1133:         if (_earnings > 0)
1134:         {
1135:             
1136:             plyr_[_pID].gen = _earnings.add(plyr_[_pID].gen);
1137:             
1138:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rIDlast].mask = _earnings.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rIDlast].mask);
1139:         }

1146:         private

1148:

1150: 
1151:         
1152:         uint256 _newTime;
1153:         if (_now > round_[_rID].end && round_[_rID].plyr == 0)
1154:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(_now);
1155:         else
1156:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(round_[_rID].end);
1157: 
1158:         
1159:         if (_newTime < (rndMax_).add(_now))
1160:             round_[_rID].end = _newTime;

1171:         private

1175:         uint256 seed = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(
1176: 
1177:             (block.timestamp).add
1178:             (block.difficulty).add

1549:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1550:         internal
1551:         pure
1552:         returns(bytes32)
1553:     {
1554:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1555:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1556: 
1557:         
1558:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1559:         
1560:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1561:         
1562:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1563:         {
1564:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1565:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1566:         }
1567: 
1568:         
1569:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1570:         
1571:         
1572:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1573:         {
1574:             
1575:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1576:             {
1577:                 
1578:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1579:                 
1580:                 
1581:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1582:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1583:             } else {
1584:                 require
1585:                 (
1586:                     
1587:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 || 
1588:                     
1589:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1590:                     
1591:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1592:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1593:                 );
1594:                 
1595:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1596:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1597: 
1598:                  
1599:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1600:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1601:             }
1602:         }
1603: 
1604:         require(_hasNonNumber == true, "string cannot be only numbers");
1605: 
1606:         bytes32 _ret;
1607:         assembly {
1608:             _ret := mload(add(_temp, 32))
1609:         }
1610:         return (_ret);
1611:     }

798:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
799:         private
800:     {
801:         
802:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
803:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
804: 
805:         
806:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 5000000000000000000)
807:         {
808:             uint256 _availableLimit = (5000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
809:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
810:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
811:             _eth = _availableLimit;
812:         }
813: 
814:         
815:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
816:         {
817: 
818:             
819:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
820: 
821:             
822:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
823:             {
824:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
825: 
826:             
827:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
828:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
829:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
830:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
831: 
832:             
833:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
834:         }
835: 
836:             
837:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
838:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
839: 
840:             
841:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
842:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
843:             rndTmEth_[_rID][0] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][0]);
844: 
845:             
846:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, 0, _eventData_);
847:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, 0, _keys, _eventData_);
848: 
849:             
850:             endTx(_pID, 0, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
851:         }
852:     }

1014:     function endRound(POOHMODatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1015:         private
1016:         returns (POOHMODatasets.EventReturns)
1017:     {
1018:         
1019:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1020: 
1021:         
1022:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1023:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1024: 
1025:         
1026:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1027: 
1028:         
1029:         
1030:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;   
1031:         uint256 _dev = (_pot / 50);            
1032:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100; 
1033:         uint256 _POOH = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].pooh)) / 100; 
1034:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_dev)).sub(_gen)).sub(_POOH); 
1035: 
1036:         
1037:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1038:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1039:         if (_dust > 0)
1040:         {
1041:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1042:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1043:         }

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
880:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
881: 
882:                     
883:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
887:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
888:                     
889:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
890:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
891: 
892:                     
893:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
897:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
898:                     
899:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
900:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
901: 
902:                     
903:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
904: 
905:                     
906:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
907:                 }
908:                 
909:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
910:                 
911:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
912: 
913:                 
914:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
915:             }
916:         }
917: 
918:             
919:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
920: 
921:             
922:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
923:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
924: 
925:             
926:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
927:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
928:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
929: 
930:             
931:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
932:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
933: 
934:             
935: 		    endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
936:         }
937:     }

1113:         private

1115:     {
1116:

1118:

1122:

1125: 
1126:         
1127:

1129:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1130:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1131:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1132:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1133: 
1134:         
1135:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1136:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1137:         if (_dust > 0)

1142: 
1143:

1145: 
1146:         
1147:         _com = _com.add(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1148:         admin.transfer(_com);
1149: 
1150:         _res = _res.add(_p3d / 2);
1151: 
1152:         
1153:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1154: 
1155:         
1156:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1157:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1158:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1159:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1160:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1161:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;

1163:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1164: 
1165:         
1166:         rID_++;
1167:         _rID++;
1168:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1169:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1170:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1171: 
1172:         return(_eventData_);

1639:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1640:         internal
1641:         pure
1642:         returns(bytes32)
1643:     {
1644:         bytes memory _temp = bytes(_input);
1645:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1646: 
1647:         
1648:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1649:         
1650:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1651:         
1652:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1653:         {
1654:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1655:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1656:         }
1657: 
1658:         
1659:         bool _hasNonNumber;
1660: 
1661:         
1662:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1663:         {
1664:             
1665:             if (_temp[i] > 0x40 && _temp[i] < 0x5b)
1666:             {
1667:                 
1668:                 _temp[i] = byte(uint(_temp[i]) + 32);
1669: 
1670:                 
1671:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false)
1672:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1673:             } else {
1674:                 require
1675:                 (
1676:                     
1677:                     _temp[i] == 0x20 ||
1678:                     
1679:                     (_temp[i] > 0x60 && _temp[i] < 0x7b) ||
1680:                     
1681:                     (_temp[i] > 0x2f && _temp[i] < 0x3a),
1682:                     "string contains invalid characters"
1683:                 );
1684:                 
1685:                 if (_temp[i] == 0x20)
1686:                     require( _temp[i+1] != 0x20, "string cannot contain consecutive spaces");
1687: 
1688:                 
1689:                 if (_hasNonNumber == false && (_temp[i] < 0x30 || _temp[i] > 0x39))
1690:                     _hasNonNumber = true;
1691:             }
1692:         }
1693:

612:         } else {

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 1000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (1000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
880:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
881: 
882:                     
883:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
887:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
888:                     
889:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
890:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
891: 
892:                     
893:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
897:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
898:                     
899:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
900:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
901: 
902:                     
903:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
904: 
905:                     
906:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
907:                 }
908:                 
909:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
910:                 
911:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
912: 
913:                 
914:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
915:             }
916:         }
917: 
918:             
919:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
920: 
921:             
922:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
923:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
924: 
925:             
926:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
927:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
928:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
929: 
930:             
931:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
932:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
933: 
934:

1112:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1113:         private
1114:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1115:     {
1116:         
1117:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1118: 
1119:         
1120:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1121:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1122: 
1123:         
1124:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1125: 
1126:         
1127:         
1128:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(48)) / 100;
1129:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 50);
1130:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1131:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1132:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1133: 
1134:         
1135:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1136:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1137:         if (_dust > 0)
1138:         {
1139:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1140:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1141:         }
1142: 
1143:         
1144:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1145: 
1146:         
1147:         _com = _com.add(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1148:         admin.transfer(_com);
1149: 
1150:         _res = _res.add(_p3d / 2);
1151: 
1152:         
1153:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1154: 
1155:         
1156:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1157:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1158:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1159:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1160:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1161:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1162:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1163:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1164: 
1165:         
1166:         rID_++;
1167:         _rID++;
1168:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1169:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1170:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1171: 
1172:         return(_eventData_);
1173:     }

1639:     function nameFilter(string _input)
1640:         internal
1641:         pure

1643:     {

1645:         uint256 _length = _temp.length;
1646: 
1647:         
1648:         require (_length <= 32 && _length > 0, "string must be between 1 and 32 characters");
1649:         
1650:         require(_temp[0] != 0x20 && _temp[_length-1] != 0x20, "string cannot start or end with space");
1651:         
1652:         if (_temp[0] == 0x30)
1653:         {
1654:             require(_temp[1] != 0x78, "string cannot start with 0x");
1655:             require(_temp[1] != 0x58, "string cannot start with 0X");
1656:         }
1657: 
1658:

1660: 
1661:         
1662:         for (uint256 i = 0; i < _length; i++)
1663:         {
1664:

830:     function core(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
831:         private
832:     {
833:         
834:         if (plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys == 0)
835:             _eventData_ = managePlayer(_pID, _eventData_);
836: 
837:         
838:         if (round_[_rID].eth < 100000000000000000000 && plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth.add(_eth) > 2000000000000000000)
839:         {
840:             uint256 _availableLimit = (2000000000000000000).sub(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
841:             uint256 _refund = _eth.sub(_availableLimit);
842:             plyr_[_pID].gen = plyr_[_pID].gen.add(_refund);
843:             _eth = _availableLimit;
844:         }
845: 
846:         
847:         if (_eth > 1000000000)
848:         {
849: 
850:             
851:             uint256 _keys = (round_[_rID].eth).keysRec(_eth);
852: 
853:             
854:             if (_keys >= 1000000000000000000)
855:             {
856:             updateTimer(_keys, _rID);
857: 
858:             
859:             if (round_[_rID].plyr != _pID)
860:                 round_[_rID].plyr = _pID;
861:             if (round_[_rID].team != _team)
862:                 round_[_rID].team = _team;
863: 
864:             
865:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + 100;
866:         }
867: 
868:             
869:             if (_eth >= 100000000000000000)
870:             {
871:             airDropTracker_++;
872:             if (airdrop() == true)
873:             {
874:                 
875:                 uint256 _prize;
876:                 if (_eth >= 10000000000000000000)
877:                 {
878:                     
879:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(75)) / 100;
880:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
881: 
882:                     
883:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
884: 
885:                     
886:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
887:                 } else if (_eth >= 1000000000000000000 && _eth < 10000000000000000000) {
888:                     
889:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(50)) / 100;
890:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
891: 
892:                     
893:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
894: 
895:                     
896:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 200000000000000000000000000000000;
897:                 } else if (_eth >= 100000000000000000 && _eth < 1000000000000000000) {
898:                     
899:                     _prize = ((airDropPot_).mul(25)) / 100;
900:                     plyr_[_pID].win = (plyr_[_pID].win).add(_prize);
901: 
902:                     
903:                     airDropPot_ = (airDropPot_).sub(_prize);
904: 
905:                     
906:                     _eventData_.compressedData += 300000000000000000000000000000000;
907:                 }
908:                 
909:                 _eventData_.compressedData += 10000000000000000000000000000000;
910:                 
911:                 _eventData_.compressedData += _prize * 1000000000000000000000000000000000;
912: 
913:                 
914:                 airDropTracker_ = 0;
915:             }
916:         }
917: 
918:             
919:             _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (airDropTracker_ * 1000);
920: 
921:             
922:             
923:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys = _keys.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].keys);
924:             plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth = _eth.add(plyrRnds_[_pID][_rID].eth);
925: 
926:             
927:             round_[_rID].keys = _keys.add(round_[_rID].keys);
928:             round_[_rID].eth = _eth.add(round_[_rID].eth);
929:             rndTmEth_[_rID][_team] = _eth.add(rndTmEth_[_rID][_team]);
930: 
931:             
932:             _eventData_ = distributeExternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _affID, _team, _eventData_);
933:             _eventData_ = distributeInternal(_rID, _pID, _eth, _team, _keys, _eventData_);
934: 
935:             
936: 		    endTx(_pID, _team, _eth, _keys, _eventData_);
937:         }
938:     }

1113:     function endRound(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1114:         private
1115:         returns (F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1116:     {
1117:         
1118:         uint256 _rID = rID_;
1119: 
1120:         
1121:         uint256 _winPID = round_[_rID].plyr;
1122:         uint256 _winTID = round_[_rID].team;
1123: 
1124:         
1125:         uint256 _pot = round_[_rID].pot;
1126: 
1127:         
1128:         
1129:         uint256 _win = (_pot.mul(35)) / 100;
1130:         uint256 _com = (_pot / 5);
1131:         uint256 _gen = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].gen)) / 100;
1132:         uint256 _p3d = (_pot.mul(potSplit_[_winTID].p3d)) / 100;
1133:         uint256 _res = (((_pot.sub(_win)).sub(_com)).sub(_gen)).sub(_p3d);
1134: 
1135:         
1136:         uint256 _ppt = (_gen.mul(1000000000000000000)) / (round_[_rID].keys);
1137:         uint256 _dust = _gen.sub((_ppt.mul(round_[_rID].keys)) / 1000000000000000000);
1138:         if (_dust > 0)
1139:         {
1140:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1141:             _res = _res.add(_dust);
1142:         }
1143: 
1144:         
1145:         plyr_[_winPID].win = _win.add(plyr_[_winPID].win);
1146: 
1147:         
1148:         _com = _com.add(_p3d.sub(_p3d / 2));
1149:         admin.transfer(_com);
1150: 
1151:         _res = _res.add(_p3d / 2);
1152: 
1153:         
1154:         round_[_rID].mask = _ppt.add(round_[_rID].mask);
1155: 
1156:         
1157:         _eventData_.compressedData = _eventData_.compressedData + (round_[_rID].end * 1000000);
1158:         _eventData_.compressedIDs = _eventData_.compressedIDs + (_winPID * 100000000000000000000000000) + (_winTID * 100000000000000000);
1159:         _eventData_.winnerAddr = plyr_[_winPID].addr;
1160:         _eventData_.winnerName = plyr_[_winPID].name;
1161:         _eventData_.amountWon = _win;
1162:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen;
1163:         _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d;
1164:         _eventData_.newPot = _res;
1165: 
1166:         
1167:         rID_++;
1168:         _rID++;
1169:         round_[_rID].strt = now;
1170:         round_[_rID].end = now.add(rndInit_).add(rndGap_);
1171:         round_[_rID].pot = _res;
1172: 
1173:         return(_eventData_);
1174:     }

1204:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(_now);
1205:         else
1206:             _newTime = (((_keys) / (1000000000000000000)).mul(rndInc_)).add(round_[_rID].end);
1207:

1209:         if (_newTime < (rndMax_).add(_now))
1210:             round_[_rID].end = _newTime;

1220:     function airdrop()
1221:         private
1222:         view
1223:         returns(bool)
1224:     {
1225:         uint256 seed = uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(
1226: 
1227:             (block.timestamp).add
1228:             (block.difficulty).add
1229:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (now)).add
1230:             (block.gaslimit).add
1231:             ((uint256(keccak256(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (now)).add
1232:             (block.number)
1233: 
1234:         )));
1235:         if((seed - ((seed / 1000) * 1000)) < airDropTracker_)
1236:             return(true);
1237:         else
1238:             return(false);

1244:     function distributeExternal(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _affID, uint256 _team, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1245:         private
1246:         returns(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1247:     {
1248:         
1249:         uint256 _p1 = _eth / 10; 
1250:         uint256 _com = _eth / 10; 
1251:         _com = _com.add(_p1); 
1252:         uint256 _p3d;
1253:         if (!address(admin).call.value(_com)())
1254:         {
1255:             
1256:             
1257:             
1258:             
1259:             
1260:             
1261:             _p3d = _com;
1262:             _com = 0;
1263:         }
1264: 
1265: 
1266:         
1267:         uint256 _aff = (_eth / 10).add(_eth / 50);
1268: 
1269:         
1270:         
1271:         if (_affID != _pID && plyr_[_affID].name != '') {
1272:             plyr_[_affID].aff = _aff.add(plyr_[_affID].aff);
1273:             emit F3Devents.onAffiliatePayout(_affID, plyr_[_affID].addr, plyr_[_affID].name, _rID, _pID, _aff, now);
1274:         } else {
1275:             _p3d = _p3d.add(_aff);
1276:         }
1277: 
1278:         
1279:         _p3d = _p3d.add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].p3d)) / (100));
1280:         if (_p3d > 0)
1281:         {
1282:             
1283:             uint256 _potAmount = _p3d / 2;
1284: 
1285:             admin.transfer(_p3d.sub(_potAmount));
1286: 
1287:             round_[_rID].pot = round_[_rID].pot.add(_potAmount);
1288: 
1289:             
1290:             _eventData_.P3DAmount = _p3d.add(_eventData_.P3DAmount);
1291:         }
1292: 
1293:         return(_eventData_);
1294:     }

1312:     function distributeInternal(uint256 _rID, uint256 _pID, uint256 _eth, uint256 _team, uint256 _keys, F3Ddatasets.EventReturns memory _eventData_)
1313:         private
1314:         returns(F3Ddatasets.EventReturns)
1315:     {
1316:         
1317:         uint256 _gen = (_eth.mul(fees_[_team].gen)) / 100;
1318: 
1319:         
1320:         uint256 _air = (_eth / 100);
1321:         airDropPot_ = airDropPot_.add(_air);
1322: 
1323:         
1324:         _eth = _eth.sub(((_eth.mul(33)) / 100).add((_eth.mul(fees_[_team].p3d)) / 100));
1325: 
1326:         
1327:         uint256 _pot = _eth.sub(_gen);
1328: 
1329:         
1330:         
1331:         uint256 _dust = updateMasks(_rID, _pID, _gen, _keys);
1332:         if (_dust > 0)
1333:             _gen = _gen.sub(_dust);
1334: 
1335:         
1336:         round_[_rID].pot = _pot.add(_dust).add(round_[_rID].pot);
1337: 
1338:         
1339:         _eventData_.genAmount = _gen.add(_eventData_.genAmount);
1340:         _eventData_.potAmount = _pot;
1341: 
1342:         return(_eventData_);
